dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8810 IH: No Fencing at the United States Supreme Court Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds to install permanent fencing around the United States Supreme Court Building or grounds.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Fencing at the United States Supreme Court Act.

section.header: Prohibiting use of funds for permanent fencing around United States Supreme Court Building or grounds
section.text: No Federal funds may be used to install permanent fencing aroundâ€”

paragraph.text: the perimeter of the United States Supreme Court Building; or
the perimeter of the Supreme Court grounds, or any portion thereof, described in section 6101(b) of title 40, United States Code.
